project_descr: Strengthening the Role of the Media in a New Democracy

outputs.output_descr:
UN Support for Strengthening of Transparency, Efficiency, Effectiveness, Participation and Accountability in Governance. Strengthening the media sector to promote democratic values and culture.  
- Transparency, accountability and participation enhanced through strengthened role and capacity of the media.

project_title: strengthening the role of the media in a new democracy
